name: Frictionless (Agent_Jo)
description:
Space is a dangerous place... Well not for you. You have mastered the art of magic and guns. But you're not alone up here and I'm not just talking about the endless waves of bad guys.
No... your heart, your loved one, your whatever you can imagine idk... is with you. It is not so strong.
Keep them alive!
(Yeah, that's about as much story as ya gonna get)

Frictionless is an endless-action-topdown-shooter-bad.guys.go.pew.pew-difficult defense game with spells and guns to assist you on your meaningless journey.

--Catch Bullets to protect the heart--

For my first ever Game Jam I think I did pretty well. I didn't focus a lot on making art and more on making a playable at least somewhat fun game, which I just pray is not too difficult.

As expected: Every asset, sound, song and piece of code was made by me.

My Highscore: 7155
Try to beat it!

~ Agent_Jo
